languages.text: "Рад слышать это. И знать, что наше видение Лекс Империалис совпадает".
"I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."
languages.original_text: "Рад слышать это. И знать, что наше видение Лекс Империалис совпадает".

traits.locale_text: "I am glad to hear it. And to know that our understanding of Lex Imperialis is in accord."
"I am glad to hear it. And to know that our understanding of Lex Imperialis is in accord."
"I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."
"I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."
"I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."
"I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."

languages.text: «Me alegra oírlo y tener la seguridad de que nuestra interpretación de la Lex Imperialis está en sintonía».
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegra oírlo y tener la seguridad de que nuestra interpretación de la Lex Imperialis está en sintonía».

languages.text: “我很高兴你这么说，也很高兴得知，我们对帝国律法的理解是一致的。”
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴你这么说，也很高兴得知，我们对帝国律法的理解是一致的。”

languages.text: 「それを聞いて、私たちのレックス・インペリアについての理解が一致していることを知って嬉しく思います」
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."

traits.locale_text: 「それを聞いて、私たちのレックス・インペリアについての理解が一致していることを知って嬉しく思います」

languages.text: « Ravi de vous l'entendre dire, et de constater que nos interprétations respectives de la Lex Imperialis se recoupent. »
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."

traits.locale_text: « Ravi de vous l'entendre dire, et de constater que nos interprétations respectives de la Lex Imperialis se recoupent. »

languages.text: "Bunu duyduğuma ve Lex İmperialis'i yorumlama biçimlerimizin uyuşmasına sevindim."
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu duyduğuma ve Lex İmperialis'i yorumlama biçimlerimizin uyuşmasına sevindim."

languages.text: "Es freut mich, das zu hören ... und dass wir das Lex Imperia ähnlich auslegen."
languages.original_text: "I am glad to hear it — and to know that our understanding of the Lex Imperialis is in accord."

traits.locale_text: "Es freut mich, das zu hören ... und dass wir das Lex Imperia ähnlich auslegen."
